description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies

level_1_features.name: Expertise
level_1_features.description: Choose two skills or tools. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for ability checks with those skills/tools

level_1_features.name: Sneak Attack
level_1_features.description: Deal extra 1d6 damage when you have advantage or an ally is within 5 feet of the target (1/turn)

level_1_features.name: Thieves' Cant
level_1_features.description: You know the secret language and signs of rogues
